title: Acadia National Park: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops Alongside other teachers, scientists and specialists we experiment with activities for your classroom, and discuss educational methods, tools, and resources. Professional development credit is provided by the University of Maine. All Teacher Workshops       Teacher Workshops Learn More     Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Imagine spending your summer hiking through spruce-fir forests, exploring tidepools, or sailing on clear waters in search of bald eagles, porpoises, and seals! Leave your classroom behind to do all this and more as an Acadia National Park teacher fellow. Bring your stories and lessons of Acadia back to your students. All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers       Become an Acadia Teacher Fellow Learn More
